dmca.title: [TP-C338502V] Copyright and Trademark Infringements by womendesignerclothes.com
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern: Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"). Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim. Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal. Legal Response Team THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. -----Original Message----- From: Jenny Wu [mailto:jenny@TRUERELIGIONBRANDJEANS.COM] Posted At: Friday, August 04, 2006 5:40 PM Posted To: Copyright Conversation: [TP-C338502V] Copyright and Trademark Infringements by womendesignerclothes.com Subject: RE: [TP-C338502V] Copyright and Trademark Infringements by womendesignerclothes.com To The Planet.com Legal Team, Please let me know what further information must be included to constitute proper notice. Thank you. Jenny Wu True Religion Brand Jeans 1525 Rio Vista Ave. Los Angeles, CA 90023 (323)266-3072 x314 -----Original Message----- From: Copyright [mailto:Copyright@theplanet.com] Sent: Thursday, August 03, 2006 9:49 AM To: Jenny Wu Cc: Theplanet@chillingeffects.org Subject: FW: [TP-C338502V] Copyright and Trademark Infringements by womendesignerclothes.com To Whom It May Concern: Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"). Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim. Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal. Legal Response Team THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. -----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Posted At: Wednesday, August 02, 2006 8:46 AM Posted To: Copyright Conversation: [TP-C338502V] Copyright and Trademark Infringements by womendesignerclothes.com Subject: [TP-C338502V] Copyright and Trademark Infringements by womendesignerclothes.com From: abuse@theplanet.com Subject: [TP-C338502V] Copyright and Trademark Infringements by womendesignerclothes.com Reference: [TP-C338502V] For your review. Thank you, Policy Enforcement The Planet Internet Services, Inc. http://www.theplanet.com/legal/ ==== Original Message ==== 1. Wed, 02 Aug 2006 13:39:25 -0500 X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft Exchange V6.5.7226.0 Content-class: urn:content-classes:message MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/mixed; boundary="----_=_NextPart_001_01C6B663.7E2D7084" Subject: Copyright and Trademark Infringements by womendesignerclothes.com Date: Wed, 2 Aug 2006 11:43:03 -0700 Message-ID: <07AB69D8ACDB484E9825746EE86B2A317716E6@ent-server.TrueReligionBrandJean s.local> X-MS-Has-Attach: yes X-MS-TNEF-Correlator: Thread-Topic: Copyright and Trademark Infringements by womendesignerclothes.com Thread-Index: Aca2Y3ytq5rqnG3eSKy0TEIcRIXYSQ== From: "Jenny Wu" To: , Received-SPF: pass (mx01.filter.theplanet.com: domain of TRUERELIGIONBRANDJEANS.COM designates 69.227.115.90 as permitted sender) client-ip=69.227.115.90; envelope-from=jenny@TRUERELIGIONBRANDJEANS.COM; helo=ent-server.TrueReligionBrandJeans.local; X-OriginalArrivalTime: 02 Aug 2006 18:39:29.0698 (UTC) FILETIME=[FD288820:01C6B662] Received-SPF: fail (mx01.filter.theplanet.com: domain of TRUERELIGIONBRANDJEANS.COM does not designate 70.87.6.110 as permitted sender) client-ip=70.87.6.110; envelope-from=jenny@TRUERELIGIONBRANDJEANS.COM; helo=smtp01.theplanet.com; (multipart/mixed) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. (multipart/alternative) MIME element (text/plain) Dear ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc, The online clothing website, www.womendesignerclothes.com has been illegally selling counterfeit True Religion Brand Jeans. Through a domain search, we've discovered that your company is the host domain for the website. Due to the website's massive selling of counterfeit True Religion products, which is a blatant violation of both U.S and California copyright and trademark laws, punishable as a felony crime, we would like you to shut down their website and forward to us their contact information. Thank you for your cooperation in this matter. Attached please find a courtesy copy of the Cease and Desist letter that was sent to them. Jenny Wu True Religion Brand Jeans 1525 Rio Vista Ave. Los Angeles, CA 90023 (323)266-3072 x314 MIME element (text/html)

Dear ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc,

 

The online clothing website, www.womendesignerclothes.com has been illegally selling counterfeit True Religion Brand Jeans.  Through a domain search, we’ve discovered that your company is the host domain for the website.  Due to the website’s massive selling of counterfeit True Religion products, which is a blatant violation of both U.S and California copyright and trademark laws, punishable as a felony crime, we would like you to shut down their website and forward to us their contact information.

 

Thank you for your cooperation in this matter. 

 

Attached please find a courtesy copy of the Cease and Desist letter that was sent to them.

 

Jenny Wu

True Religion Brand Jeans

1525 Rio Vista Ave.

Los Angeles, CA 90023

(323)266-3072 x314

 

MIME element (text/plain) MIME element (application/msword) MIME element (text/plain)
